alert.note: Alert for Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 07 at 3:38AM EST until March 07 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation including snow, sleet, and freezing rain expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to a few hundredths of an inch. * WHERE...All of northern New York except the Champlain Valley. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The morning commute could be impacted. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures near or below freezing this morning will allow for a wintry mix of precipitation. Although a few pockets of freezing rain will still be possible this afternoon, warming temperatures will result in most areas changing over to plain rain.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton; Western Essex
